Topics of interest: Derivatives, Volatility, Risk Management, Asset Pricing, Investments, Corporate Finance, Corporate Governance, Market Microstructure, Banking, Personal and Household Finance, ESG and Climate Finance, AI and Big Data, Blockchain and Crypto Assets, Fintech, Regulation, Behavioral Finance

Location: Schulich School of Business, York University Toronto, Canada

Conference: Southern Finance Association 2025 Annual Meeting
Topics of interest: Any area of finance, proposals for panel discussions, special sessions, or tutorials

Conference: 2025 PCAOB/Management Science Registered Reports Conference
Topics of interest: All aspects of auditing issuers and brokers and dealers, impact of audit regulation and audit oversight, labor trends in accounting markets, impact of audit regulation on capital flows and public companies’ cost of capital, changes in the funding sources and ownership of audit firms, role of information efficiency and disclosures in shaping growth, consequences of mergers and acquisitions on the industrial organization of the audit profession, Board of Directors governance and oversight, accounting scandals and influence of auditor independence, economic dependence, professional skepticism, and conflicts of interest on audit outcomes
